blocks.name: elrfi
blocks.content: Elementhood in a set of relative finite intersections. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  mpan9(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wss(c3, c0))), wss(cv(s1), c2), wral(s0, cv(s1), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), cv(s0)), c3)), wral(s0, c2, wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), cv(s0)), c3)))

blocks.name: cmpfiiin
blocks.content: In a compact topology, a system of closed sets with nonempty finite intersections has a nonempty intersection. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmpfiiin(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wne(cin(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), emptycls))
  -| wceq(c0, cuni(c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, ccmp))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ccld, c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), cfn))), wne(cin(c0, ciin(s0, cv(s1), c2)), emptycls))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqnetrd(cin(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), emptycls, cint(cun(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cin(c0, ciin(s0, c1, c2)), cint(cun(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))))), wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c3)), wral(s0, c1, wss(c2, c0)))
  riinint(s0, c0, cfv(ccld, c3), c1, c2)
  syl3anc(w0, wne(cint(cun(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)))), emptycls), wcel(c3, ccmp), wss(cun(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))), cfv(ccld, c3)), wn(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)))))))
  unssd(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), cfv(ccld, c3), w0)
  snssd(c0, cfv(ccld, c3), w0)
  frnd(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cfv(ccld, c3), c1, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c2, cfv(ccld, c3), w0)
  mtbird(w0, wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(emptycls, cin(c0, ciin(s0, cv(s1), c2)))))
  nrexdv(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), w0, wceq(emptycls, cin(c0, ciin(s0, cv(s1), c2))))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wn(wceq(emptycls, cin(c0, ciin(s0, cv(s1), c2)))), wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), cfn)))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c1), cfn)), wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), cfn)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cpw(c1)), wcel(cv(s1), cfn)))
  elin(cv(s1), cpw(c1), cfn)
  anim1i(wcel(cv(s1), cpw(c1)), wcel(cv(s1), cfn), wss(cv(s1), c1))
  elpwi(cv(s1), c1)
  sylib(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), cfn))), wn(wceq(emptycls, cin(c0, ciin(s0, cv(s1), c2)))), wne(cin(c0, ciin(s0, cv(s1), c2)), emptycls))
  nesym(cin(c0, ciin(s0, cv(s1), c2)), emptycls)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(emptycls, cfv(cfi, cun(csn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c1), cfn), wceq(emptycls, cin(c0, ciin(s0, cv(s1), c2))))), wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c3)), wral(s0, c1, wss(c2, c0)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c3)), wcel(c3, ctop))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, ctop), wcel(c3, ccmp))
  cmptop(c3)

  diff.cfv.s(s1, ccld, c3)

thm cmpfiiin(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ⋂ ⋂(s0 ∈ c1, c2))≠ ∅)
  ⊣ c0 = ⋃ c3
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ Comp)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈(Clsd ` c3))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ Fin))→(c0 ⋂ ⋂(s0 ∈ s1, c2))≠ ∅)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqnetrd((c0 ⋂ ⋂(s0 ∈ c1, c2)), emptycls, ⋂({ c0 } ⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ⋂ ⋂(s0 ∈ c1, c2))= ⋂({ c0 } ⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))), c0 ∈(Clsd ` c3), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ c0))
  riinint(s0, c0, (Clsd ` c3), c1, c2)
  syl3anc(w0, ⋂({ c0 } ⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))≠ ∅, c3 ∈ Comp, ({ c0 } ⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))⊆(Clsd ` c3), ¬ ∅ ∈(fi `({ c0 } ⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))))
  unssd({ c0 }, ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), (Clsd ` c3), w0)
  snssd(c0, (Clsd ` c3), w0)
  frnd((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), (Clsd ` c3), c1, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, c2, (Clsd ` c3), w0)
  mtbird(w0, ∅ ∈(fi `({ c0 } ⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))), ∃(s1 ∈(P(c1)⋂ Fin), ∅ =(c0 ⋂ ⋂(s0 ∈ s1, c2))))
  nrexdv(s1, (P(c1)⋂ Fin), w0, ∅ =(c0 ⋂ ⋂(s0 ∈ s1, c2)))
  sylan2(w0, s1 ∈(P(c1)⋂ Fin), ¬ ∅ =(c0 ⋂ ⋂(s0 ∈ s1, c2)), (s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ Fin))
  sylbi(s1 ∈(P(c1)⋂ Fin), (s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ Fin), (s1 ∈ P(c1)∧ s1 ∈ Fin))
  elin(s1, P(c1), cfn)
  anim1i(s1 ∈ P(c1), s1 ∈ Fin, s1 ⊆ c1)
  elpwi(s1, c1)
  sylib((w0 ∧(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ Fin)), ¬ ∅ =(c0 ⋂ ⋂(s0 ∈ s1, c2)), (c0 ⋂ ⋂(s0 ∈ s1, c2))≠ ∅)
  nesym((c0 ⋂ ⋂(s0 ∈ s1, c2)), emptycls)
  syl2anc(w0, (∅ ∈(fi `({ c0 } ⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))))↔ ∃(s1 ∈(P(c1)⋂ Fin), ∅ =(c0 ⋂ ⋂(s0 ∈ s1, c2)))), c0 ∈(Clsd ` c3), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆ c0))
  syl(w0, c0 ∈(Clsd ` c3), c3 ∈ Top)
  syl(w0, c3 ∈ Top, c3 ∈ Comp)
  cmptop(c3)
  topcld(c3, c0)
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, c2 ⊆ c0)
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), c2 ⊆ c0, c2 ∈(Clsd ` c3))
  cldss(c2, c3, c0)
  elrfirn2(s0, s1, c0, (Clsd ` c3), c1, c2, emptycls)
  cmpfii(c3, ({ c0 } ⋃ ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ccld, c3)
  diff.ccld.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ccld, c3)
  diff.ccld.s(s1)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
}
